mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.visit_id AS "visitId", a.presc_date AS "prescDate", a.presc_no AS "prescNo", a.dispensary AS "dispensary", a.name AS "name", a.name_phonetic AS "namePhonetic", a.identity AS "identity", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.unit_in_contract AS "unitInContract", a.presc_type AS "prescType", a.presc_attr AS "prescAttr", a.presc_source AS "prescSource", a.discharge_taking_indicator AS "dischargeTakingIndicator", a.binding_presc_title AS "bindingPrescTitle", a.repetition AS "repetition", a.count_per_repetition AS "countPerRepetition", a.costs AS "costs", a.payments AS "payments", a.ordered_by AS "orderedBy", a.prescribed_by AS "prescribedBy", a.entered_by AS "enteredBy", a.presc_status AS "prescStatus", a.dispensing_provider AS "dispensingProvider", a.usage AS "usage", a.decoction AS "decoction", a.doctor_user AS "doctorUser", a.newly_print AS "newlyPrint", a.verify_by AS "verifyBy", a.verified_datetime AS "verifiedDatetime", a.diagnosis_name AS "diagnosisName", a.dispensary_sub AS "dispensarySub", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_data AS "createData", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_data AS "updateData", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doct_drug_presc_master( id, org_id, patient_id, visit_id, presc_date, presc_no, dispensary, name, name_phonetic, identity, charge_type, unit_in_contract, presc_type, presc_attr, presc_source, discharge_taking_indicator, binding_presc_title, repetition, count_per_repetition, costs, payments, ordered_by, prescribed_by, entered_by, presc_status, dispensing_provider, usage, decoction, doctor_user, newly_print, verify_by, verified_datetime, diagnosis_name, dispensary_sub, create_by, create_data, update_by, update_data, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{prescDate}, #{prescNo}, #{dispensary}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{unitInContract}, #{prescType}, #{prescAttr}, #{prescSource}, #{dischargeTakingIndicator}, #{bindingPrescTitle}, #{repetition}, #{countPerRepetition}, #{costs}, #{payments}, #{orderedBy}, #{prescribedBy}, #{enteredBy}, #{prescStatus}, #{dispensingProvider}, #{usage}, #{decoction}, #{doctorUser}, #{newlyPrint}, #{verifyBy}, #{verifiedDatetime}, #{diagnosisName}, #{dispensarySub}, #{createBy.id}, #{createData}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateData}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doct_drug_presc_master SET org_id = #{orgId}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, presc_date = #{prescDate}, presc_no = #{prescNo}, dispensary = #{dispensary}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, unit_in_contract = #{unitInContract}, presc_type = #{prescType}, presc_attr = #{prescAttr}, presc_source = #{prescSource}, discharge_taking_indicator = #{dischargeTakingIndicator}, binding_presc_title = #{bindingPrescTitle}, repetition = #{repetition}, count_per_repetition = #{countPerRepetition}, costs = #{costs}, payments = #{payments}, ordered_by = #{orderedBy}, prescribed_by = #{prescribedBy}, entered_by = #{enteredBy}, presc_status = #{prescStatus}, dispensing_provider = #{dispensingProvider}, usage = #{usage}, decoction = #{decoction}, doctor_user = #{doctorUser}, newly_print = #{newlyPrint}, verify_by = #{verifyBy}, verified_datetime = #{verifiedDatetime}, diagnosis_name = #{diagnosisName}, dispensary_sub = #{dispensarySub}, create_data = #{createData}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_data = #{updateData}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
